relationships.description: Harry has the potential to add salamander blood to his potion, but is prevented by Hermione.
Professor Umbridge is questioning Snape about something.
Harry almost added pomegranate juice to his potion, but was stopped by Hermione.
Hermione prevented Harry from adding the wrong ingredient to his potion.
